name: My Horse Stories
description:
~~> Go from city girl to country gal!
~~> Choose your horse and become a top horse racer!
~~> Get ready for a summer of drama! Compete against your rival, and maybe even fall in love with your crush!

You were looking forward to chilling this summer in NYC... but your plans have changed. Against your will, you’re sent to middle-of-nowhere-Kentucky, to spend the summer with your grandma on a horse farm.

You better make the most of it! Put on those cowgirl boots, style your new horse, and start racing like a champ! Watch out for southern belles - they're not all as sweet as they pretend to be. And enjoy spending time with the stable boy... ooh la la!

Features:
> Make the most of the summer - become a horse racing champ!
> Train every day till you’re ready to compete in international horse races.
> Raise your horse. Feed him, groom him, dress him up in an eye-catching saddle.
> Do farm chores. Too lazy? Too bad! Grams won’t let you off easy. Upgrade your farm and build new facilities.
> Get help perfecting your horse racing skills, from the sultry stable boy. (Is that LUUUURVE in the air?!)
> Do NOT let that prissy, snooty “champion” named Kaitlyn stand in your way - show her who’s the new champion in town!
> Compete in exciting horse racing competitions around the world!
> Wow the crowd with your amazing jumps.
> Climb the leaderboard and make your family proud!
